name: Sausage For Live
description:
small game created for the "Disc Room Game Jam".
you like sausages? come and save them.

A sausage in a disc room ... the rest is up to you.
if you have good reflexes the sausage will stay alive and you can leave the room.... to enter another room for a longer time.

after playing this game, only one desire .... to eat sausages!

------------------------------------
to play:

the arrows for left and right.
the top arrow to jump.
the arrow underneath to lie down.
The space bar to stand up again.
